function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of medical resources in severely affected areas","Impact":"Inability to provide adequate medical care, leading to increased spread of the virus and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Deploying medical staff from less affected areas to severely affected areas, ensuring adequate logistics supply","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote diagnosis and treatment","People":"Residents in severely affected areas, medical staff","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Close contact as a key channel of infection","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus through person-to-person contact","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to minimize close contact, such as lockdowns, mask-wearing, and non-contact distribution of goods","Technologies":"Telemedicine, non-contact distribution systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Large-scale population movement causing infection","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to population movement","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control and monitor population movement, using telemedicine for remote care","Technologies":"Telemedicine, population movement tracking systems","People":"General population, medical staff","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
